mapper.insert: insert into user(id, name, phone, profile_img, reg_datetime, updated_datetime, last_login_datetime, email) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{profile_img, typeHandler=com.middleware.JsonObjectTypeHandler}, now(), now(), now(),#{email})
mapper.select: select IF(EXISTS(select * from employee WHERE user_no = #{no}), 'EMPLOYEE', 'SUPPLIER')
mapper.update: update user SET name = #{name}, updated_datetime = now() WHERE no = #{no}
update user SET phone = #{phone}, updated_datetime = now() WHERE no = #{no}
update user SET profile_img = #{profile_img, typeHandler=com.middleware.JsonObjectTypeHandler}, updated_datetime = now() WHERE no = #{no}
